user_prompt:
user:

ancillary_data:
q: title: Will Karoline Leavitt say "Putin" 5+ times during next White House press briefing?, description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if Karoline Leavitt says the listed term during the next White House press briefing she participates in. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If no such press briefing happens by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No". If Leavitt ceases to be White House press secretary for any length of time by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be video and transcripts of the press briefing.

resolution_conditions:
res_data:p1: 0, p2: 1, p3: 0.5. Where p1 corresponds to No, p2 to Yes, p3 to unknown/50-50.

The query asks whether Karoline Leavitt will say "Putin" five or more times during her next White House press briefing. Based on the current timestamp of **March 25, 2025**, the "next" press briefing would refer to the first one occurring after this date.  

### Key Analysis:  
1. **No Post-March 25 Briefings Documented**: The latest available search results include briefings up to March 22, 2025[4], March 19, 2025[5][7], and March 17, 2025[6][8][10][14]. There is no verifiable information about any press briefings occurring after March 25, 2025.  
2. **Event Is Scheduled for the Future**: Since the "next" briefing relative to March 25, 2025, has not yet occurred, this remains a future event. Per the resolution rules, events scheduled for a future date or time must resolve to **p4** (cannot be resolved at this time).  
3. **No Evidence of Cancellation or Postponement**: There is no indication that Leavitt has ceased to be press secretary or that future briefings are canceled.  

### Recommendation: p4  
**Rationale**: The event in question is scheduled for a future date relative to the current timestamp, and no verifiable information about its occurrence or outcome exists.
